Pre-Game Insights: India will look to be on top of its game in all three departments while the hosts would want their middle-order to fire
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch for the first game aided spinners considerably, and once the ball became soft, boundaries were hard to come by
Others: India received another injury blow after leg-spinner Wanindu Hasaranga was ruled out of the remaining two fixtures due to a hamstring injury he suffered during the first ODI.
